data.name: A Last Song
data.detailed_description:
Welcome aboard the Vaiker !
I’m one of the last survivors and I need your help little Melobot. You’re the only one able to take on this quest. Find the Meloplants and protect them from the storm created by defective robots. I need you to face them in order to find my companions. They’ll help you to find a way to fix this mess.



Become a musician
Try out this new take on musical video games, where there is more than rhythm. Pick up the Melobot’s instrument and use the 9 notes on your keyboard as your main tool to explore and survive on this planet. Take your time to listen and memorize the songs of the Meloplants. You don't need to know anything about music theory to play melodies like a maestro!



Survive!
Explore in a new way against a storm covering the entire planet. Battle (or flee!) the Vespods, the deadly robot still threatening the world.



Gear up your robot
Unlock technologies, equip items, and gear up the Melobot with what YOU think is the best way to complete your quest.
